## Source: ossf-package-analysis (a1d577f52f10cee6de3de2dee9eb8d3d70fb94c04b41f3dfb93794409066d6c8)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@b2bneo/components-tabs' @ 1.3.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
